name: Space Invaders (itch) (k4gi)
description:
My approximation of one of the great classics.

Use A and D or the left and right arrows to move the ship, and the spacebar to fire.

If your device has a touch screen some touch buttons should be visible at the bottom. On my laptop I can see the touch screen buttons even though it doesn't have a touch screen??

You can set a name in the settings menu for the high score table, and export a backup copy of the high score table like all polite web games.

Font is Alagard by Hewett Tsoi
